talk_1010: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Oh, are you investigating this place too?
talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>Look...<sp:5:0:0> See how this <clr:0000>stone statue<clr:ffff> has
fallen into the wall?

These statues are typically set in rows
with one sight line leading to the next
until they finally stop at an <clr:0000>old mine<clr:ffff>.
But this is different. This chain of statues
ends here.<sp:5:0:0> I've looked all over, but there's
no sign of an old mine.
talk_1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Could it somehow be <clr:0000>inside this wall<clr:ffff>...
But I don't see any kind of entrance.
talk_1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Oh, well.<sp:5:0:0> I found you here,<sp:5:0:0> so at least
the statues led me to a hero.
talk_1042:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Normally, <clr:0000>stone statues <clr:ffff>like these are
arranged in a row leading to an <clr:0000>old mine<clr:ffff>.

But this row doesn't lead anywhere.<sp:5:0:0>
I've looked all over, but there's no sign
of an old mine.
<snd:Sad>If there's no way to get <clr:0000>inside the wall<clr:ffff>,
maybe it's just a misplaced set of statues.
Still, it's weird...
talk_1043:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This <clr:0000>statue<clr:ffff>'s the same as the others,
right?<sp:5:0:0> The ones that lead to an
<clr:0000>abandoned mine<clr:ffff>?
But this row...ends here.<sp:5:0:0> I've looked all
over, but there's no sign of an old mine.
talk_1044:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>Do you know if there's anything <clr:0000>inside
the wall<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:0:0> Or even a way to get inside?
talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>That's strange.<sp:5:0:0> There definitely should be
something up ahead...
talk_1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>Hey! I see what you're doing! You're
ignoring me, probably thinking, "Ugh,
another Yiga Clan trap. I'll keep walking."
